gui.title: Create Light Group
gui.description: Create a light group where each light maintains a brightness offset from the master.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this light group
data_description.entity_id: Select two or more lights to include in this group

yaml.title: Import from YAML
yaml.description:
Paste your YAML configuration below.

**Example format:**
```yaml
name: My Light Group
offset_type: absolute
lights:
  - entity_id: light.living_room
    offset: 0
    min_brightness: 1
    max_brightness: 100
```

{error_detail}

offsets.description: For each light, set the brightness offset (negative = dimmer), minimum brightness floor, and maximum brightness ceiling.
